participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: A cheerful and outgoing individual who enjoys connecting with others and exploring new hobbies.
participant_1.background: I run every morning before work to clear my head and relieve stress. I live in Nashville. I'm into music, but my dog, Socks, doesn't seem to care. I created a mobile with cute animals to hang above my baby's crib. My dogs are my most valued possessions.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: An adventurous and active person who loves to stay fit and enjoys culinary experiments in the kitchen.
participant_2.background: I collect memories of my vacations, including the deer I saw on Lake Michigan. I enjoy lifting weights on my days off to stay in shape. I start an internship in engineering later this year. I like to make fresh pies. I drive only Toyota.

content.text: Hey there! I'm looking for some friends in the Nashville area.
Hey! I'm in Nashville too! What are your interests?
I love running, music, and spending time with my dogs.
Oh cool! I love lifting weights and making fresh pies.
I've never made a pie before! That sounds fun!
It is! I love trying new recipes.
Me too! I've been trying to learn more about music production lately.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of music are you into?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
Me too! I love finding new bands to listen to.
Yeah! It's so much fun to discover new music.
Do you have any favorite bands?
I love The 1975, Pale Waves, and The Japanese House.
Oh I love The 1975! I've never heard of Pale Waves or The Japanese House before, I'll have to check them out.
